data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Quiet hours (no SMS 10pm-8am)". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.
